Volkshaus, Basel, Switzerland 7 Bands competed (mixed Brass/Wind)
Best Work: La Cucaracha, arr. N. Iwai (JBO Allschwil) Soloist Prize: Grandfather's Clock, G. Doughty, G. Someret (Es-Horn - Karin Distel, Future Band) Special Price: JBO Allschwil, Improvisation: Querflöte, Saxophone, Klavier
Winner: JBO Allschwil, 187 Points
